name: Biofuel (Golopogus)
description:
** If you get a bad spawn just restart (sometimes the planets spawn too close and screw with the gravity)**

Forgot to mention in game that up arrow is the engine while in the spaceship.

I wanted to try something new and large in scope this time around. I made a game with procedural planet generation and planet exploration. There are thousands of planets to discover and each one will be different in its own way! There were a lot of difficult problems and unique solutions I made for loading planet chunks that will go unappreciated to the untrained eye but I hope you all can spend the time and see all the intricacies of this unfinished game! 

If something goes wrong just refresh and start again!  ( There were way too many bugs to get them all!) - and yes I know you can jump infinitely.
